name: Rap Battle Voting Channel Opens
desc: A promotion image for a competition in the vagrant camp. You have plenty of reasons to suspect this was made by a certain rapper.

volumes.title: Rap Battle Voting Channel Opens
volumes.localDesc:
*This poster is completely filled with highly saturated colors, bright enough to burn the eye in this bleak vagrant camp.*

The voting channel for the next season of Rap Battles has opened
Rap lovers, come one, come all!

Yo
Yo
So how 'bout adding some challenges in your boring old life
Come join the Rap Battles even if ya got no mic at the live
Don't worry if your rhythm and rhyme seem just a bit too light
Get on the stage and Dr. Dig might then give you a like

Or maybe you just want to be a part of our big audience
Then we've also got ways to heat up our ambiance
Y'know the Rap Battles voting channels just went into existence
And all the rappers are gon' be here, even with no influence
So why you standing 'round giving all this hesitance
Don't be here wastin' your precious vote of confidence

The brand-new season of the largest rap battle
in the history of the Svarog base is ON!
88 Degreez Under the Mine? Doggie Spock? Big Daddy Invincible?
All the celebs are here for tonight's show!
Voting for contestants to stay or go?
Sing your heart out on the grand stage?
It's all up to you!

Please consult Dr. Dig for details on how to join or vote in this season of the Rap Battles!
